REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f1488 reute r f BC-gandalf,-british 04-07 0055

TEXT.TITLE: GANDALF <GANDF>, BRITISH TELECOM IN AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Gandalf Technologies Inc said it signed a two-year, eight mln dlr agreement with British Telecom to distribute British Telecom's Mezza Voicestation System in Canada and the United States. Gandalf said it will market the system as the Gandalf Voicestation System. Reuter
